Html:
Hi all,

thanks for visiting. I noticed one problem with the Releases in this project - as soon as I publish a Release, it immediately becomes out of date. So to prevent people from downloading outdated information, I will not publish any releases and people can directly download the latest source code from the Source Code tab.

Of course, you can always view and use the application live at http://livegeometry.com

Let me know if you have any questions,

Thanks,

Kirill Osenkov
